00040 #ifndef METACODE_CPP
00041 #define METACODE_CPP
00042 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00043 // This will expose all keyboard and mouse, joystick and other userinput events
00044 // to developers, we are using the SDL keymap to get us started, large portions
00045 // are directly copy/pasta'd, so we included their license too
00046 ///////////////////////////////////////
00047

00051 ///////////////////////////////////////

00054 #include "metacode.h"

00057 #include <ostream>
00058 
00059 #include "SDL.h"

00061 using namespace std;

00063 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00064 // MetaCode
00065 ///////////////////////////////////////
00066 namespace phys
00067 {
00068     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00069     // Creation and Deletion Methods
00070     ///////////////////////////////////////
00071     MetaCode::MetaCode()
00072     {}
00073 
00074     MetaCode::MetaCode(const int &MetaValue_, const short unsigned int &ID_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00075     {
00076         Construct(MetaValue_, ID_, Code_);
00077     }
00078 
00079     MetaCode::MetaCode(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00080     {
00081         Construct(RawEvent_);
00082     }
00083 
00084     void MetaCode::Construct(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00085     {
00086         //create a safe but gibberish default
00087         Construct(BUTTON_UP, 0, KEY_FIRST);
00088         /// @todo TODO: Actually process each event
00089         switch(RawEvent_.type)
00090         {
00091             case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00092                 //    Construct(MetaValue_, ID_, Code_);
00093                 Construct(BUTTON_PRESSING, 0, GetInputCodeFromSDL_KEY(RawEvent_));
00094                 break;
00095             case SDL_KEYUP:
00096                 Construct(BUTTON_LIFTING, 0, GetInputCodeFromSDL_KEY(RawEvent_));
00097                 break;
00098 
00099             case SDL_JOYAXISMOTION:/// @todo TODO determine if Joystick RawEvents will emit 1 or multiple Metacodes
00100                 break;
00101             case SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN:
00102                 break;
00103             case SDL_JOYBUTTONUP:
00104                 break;
00105             case SDL_JOYBALLMOTION:
00106                 break;
00107             case SDL_JOYHATMOTION:
00108                 break;
00109 
00110             case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00111             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00112             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00113                 throw ("RawEvent which creates Multiple Metacodes inserted into Metacode");
00114                 break;
00115 
00116             default:
00117                 throw ("Unknown User Input Inserted into Metacode");
00118                 break;
00119         }
00120     }
00121 
00122     void MetaCode::Construct(const int &MetaValue_, const short unsigned int &ID_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00123     {
00124         SetMetaValue(MetaValue_);
00125         SetID(ID_);
00126         SetCode(Code_);
00127     }
00128 
00129     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00130     // Dirty Hacks
00131     ///////////////////////////////////////
00132 
00133     //This function assumes the RawEvent is a valid SDL Keyevent
00134     MetaCode::InputCode MetaCode::GetInputCodeFromSDL_KEY(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00135     {
00136         //This Whole thing will only work with SDL events. If we switch out event subsystems this is one of those that must change it.
00137         MetaCode::InputCode To;
00138 
00139         assert( sizeof(To)==sizeof(RawEvent_.key.keysym.sym) );
00140         memcpy( &To, &(RawEvent_.key.keysym.sym), sizeof(RawEvent_.key.keysym.sym));
00141 
00142         return To;
00143     }
00144

00148     int MetaCode::GetMetaValue() const
00149     {
00150         return this->MetaValue;
00151     }

00154     {
00155         return this->Code;

00159     {
00160         return this->ID;
00161     }

00164     {
00165         this->MetaValue=MetaValue_;
00166     }
00167

00169     {
00170         this->Code=Code_;
00171     }
00172

00174     {
00175         this->ID=ID_;
00176     }

00182     bool MetaCode::operator==(const MetaCode &other) const
00183     {
00184         if(this->Code == other.Code && this->MetaValue == other.MetaValue)
00185         {
00186             return true;
00187         }else{
00188             return false;
00189         }
00190     }
00191 }
00192 
00193 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::MetaCode& x)
00194 {
00195     stream << "( MetaValue:" << x.GetMetaValue()
00196            << ", ID:" << x.GetID()
00197            << ", Code:" << x.GetCode()
00198            <<  " )";
00199     return stream;
00200 }
